properties.areaDesc: East Valley; Rio Verde/Salt River; Fountain Hills/East Mesa; Scottsdale/Paradise Valley; Cave Creek/New River
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
At 644 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported a strong
thunderstorm over Granite Reef Dam, or near Fountain Hills, moving
north at 20 mph.

Penny size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible with
this storm.

Locations impacted include...
Mesa, Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Granite Reef Dam, McDowell Mountain
Park, Rio Verde, Falcon Field Airport and Fort McDowell.

This includes the following highways...
AZ Route 87 between mile markers 181 and 193.
AZ Route 202 between mile markers 16 and 24.
properties.instruction:
Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may lead
to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.

This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio
stations and available television stations for additional information
and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR MARICOPA COUNTY UNTIL 715 PM MST
